text: William "Bill" Finger (February 8, 1914 - January 18, 1974Bill Finger Biography , www.fingerfamily.com) was an American comic book writer and artist who helped create Batman, Green Lantern, and some villains along with Bob Kane and Jerry Robinson. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Comic Book Artist #3 (Winter 1999): "The Bob Kane Letter" (September 14, 1965 open letter by Bob Kane) Category:1914 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics writers Category:American comics artists Category:Entertainers from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:DC Comics Category:Batman
title: Bill Finger
